sentences.sContent: The Fed wants banks to continue to lend to creditworthy borrowers.
sentences.sCn: 联邦储备银行想让各家银行继续贷款给信用良好的借款人。

words.tran: 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望
好信誉；有资格接受信用贷款
相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂

trans.tranOther: A creditworthy person or organization is one who can safely be lent money or allowed to have goods on credit, for example, because in the past they have always paid back what they owe
